Author: redhotjillypepper
Text: Oh no. I know that feel tho. I worked at the boys and girls club and it was weird. I didn't even need to notice how small the kids were. they'd bring it up. its that brutally honest shit people are always talking about. Except the brutal honesty isn't contaminated with a layer of toxicity like adults' "honesty" is.   kids will always be my favorite genre of people.
